EmailTemplate.description: DEF BE email sent to Client when SIR is generated (nl,fr,eng)
EmailTemplate.name: DEF_BE_Service Intervention Report email to customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Rapport d'Intervention/Interventieverslag {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Site__c}– {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Bonjour {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Contact__c},
Veuillez trouver ci_joint le rapport d'intervention relatif à la visite de {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Type__c} pour {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Site__c} - {! SVMXC__Service_Order__c.LocationAddress__c} {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__City__c}{!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Zip__c}.
Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute clarfication supplémentaire.
Cordialement,
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hallo {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Contact__c},
Bijgevoegd vindt u het antwoordrapport voor het bezoek van {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Type__c} voor {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Site__c} -
{!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.LocationAddress__c} {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__City__c}{!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Zip__c}.
Wij blijven tot uw beschikking voor verdere verduidelijking.
Met vriendelijke groeten,
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Contact__c},
Please find attached the Service Intervention Report on the {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Type__c} intervention for {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Site__c} - {! SVMXC__Service_Order__c.LocationAddress__c} {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__City__c}{!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMXC__Zip__c}.
We remain at your disposal for any further clarification.
Sincerely,
DEF Belgium
+32 2 331 31 30
http://www.def-online.be/
